message.content:
principle: principles that guide a particular belief or action
doctrine: a particular theory or set of ideas
creed: a statement of the beliefs or aims that guide an individual or group
dogma: a belief or set of beliefs that is accepted by a group without question
maxims: statements that are accepted as true and that guide behavior or action
statutes: written laws and regulations
canons: a set of rules or principles
charter: an official document granting authority or rights
constitution: the fundamental laws and principles of a state or organization
bylaws: the rules and regulations governing the internal affairs of an organization.
